title: I3P
overview: In Paris, if you have amnesia, if you have visions or if you show signs of delirium in the street, you are taken to the Paris Police Psychiatric Unit. A discreet address, the 3PU is headed by Professor Mathias Bernardt, a psychiatrist who has the power to let his patients return to their normal life, to hospitalize them but also to hand them over to the police.
